stateDiagram

state OFF {

        OFF_READY

        OFF_READY : OFF_READY

        OFF_TIMED_OUT

        OFF_TIMED_OUT : OFF_TIMED_OUT

        state "$initial_state" as OFF.(InitialState)

}

ON1

ON1 : ON1

ON1 : enter / #123; font_color = "black"#59; #125;

ON1 : enter / #123; bg_color = "yellow"#59; #125;

ON1 : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

OFF_READY --> ON1 : do [input_active]

OFF_TIMED_OUT --> OFF_READY : do [! input_active]

OFF.(InitialState) --> OFF_READY

ON1 --> OFF : do [! input_active]

ON1 --> OFF_TIMED_OUT : do [timer_ms > 3000]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> OFF
Events
settings
